Smart Door Look

Smart Door Look
USD 1.99

When moisture enters the water sensor, the leakage protection system gives an alarm signal and automatically shuts off the water supply using ball actuators.

Resumption of supply will occur only after the elimination of the accident.

1 point / 2 valves for hot / cold water risers (there may be several risers)
